questions.question: Considering the overall shape and dimensions, what best describes the form of this food package?
What primary color is predominantly used in the background of this food label?
Disregarding any text, describe the color of the secondary graphic elements on the package?
Considering the text's style, what kind of font is utilized for the product name?
Based on the text alone, what specific food item is contained within this packaging?
What secondary ingredient, as explicitly stated on the packaging, is included in this dish?
Focusing solely on the textual description, what is another key ingredient besides cheese?
What kind of design element, aside from text, is present on the left side of the product's label?
Considering the textual elements, describe the style in which the product's name is presented?
Describe the apparent texture of the packaging surface based on visual cues?
What is the general material that seems to be used in the construction of this package?
On the right, what kind of graphic element is displayed next to the product details?
Considering the visual style, would you characterize the overall design aesthetic as modern or traditional?
Focusing on the textual content, is the product name written in English or another language?
Does the label contain any other visible markings, symbols, or codes besides the text and graphics?
